short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes any instance of the phrase 'fake news' to 'propaganda'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes any instance of the phrase 'fake news' to 'propaganda'. Not all fake news is necessarily directed by a large power to pursue an ideological goal, but certainly some of it is, and not calling it by name can make it seem like less of a threat. This extension invites you to question the deeper intentions behind any piece of fake news presented as fact.

--

per a request by @leighalexander
